query:
UPDATE v2_queue
                SET flow_status = jsonb_set(
                    jsonb_set(flow_status, ARRAY['failure_module', 'job'], to_jsonb($1::UUID::TEXT)),
                    ARRAY['failure_module', 'type'],
                    to_jsonb('InProgress'::text)
                )
                WHERE id = $2 AND workspace_id = $3
